awd_titl_txt: Prediction of Field Collapse of Soils
awd_abstract_narration: The purpose of the project is to develop a                                      down-hole in-situ loading plate test under                                      various wet conditions, which will provide                                      data that can be used to anticipate                                             settlement damage to structures resting on                                      collapsible soils; and the development of a                                     simplified analysis technique which can be                                      used efficiently by practicing engineers.                                       The workplan includes:  1) development of                                       hardware; 2) development of testing                                             procedures; 3) development of procedures for                                    extrapolating the test data to the prototype;                                   and 4) checking the system by applying it to                                    a medium-scale field test.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
